attributes.action: End 10 day isolation period for returning UK citizens
attributes.additional_details: UK citizens have the right to be free from isolation when arriving back in the UK and not confined from freedom in their homes
attributes.background: Citizens returning to the UK should not have to isolate from a virus that is now being handled in comparison to the flu whether vaccinated or not.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Extend rules for UK travel for vaccinated travellers to unvaccinated travellers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597783

Remove all COVID requirements for international travel to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605858
